category.name: Product Structure.CAD BOM Alignment
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: FND0_COPY_DESIGN_PROP_TO_PART
preference.preference_description: Enable the functionality to copy properties from Design BOM Line to Part BOM Line on Alignment. Values will have format of Design_Property_name : Part_Property_name where Design_Property_name value from DesignBOMLine will be copied to Part_Property_name value from PartBOMLine. In case of invalid value format properties will not get copied and the operation of Alignment will continue.
